plot: Cartman plans an elaborate revenge when an older boy cons him out of money.

Cartman has been conned out of his money by Scott Tenorman, a sour ninth grader, so Cartman is out for any kind of revenge possible. He attempts to bargain with Scott, only to be tricked again and have to do a ridiculous piggy performance. What's worse, Scott shows the video of the piggy dance to everyone in town, sparking Cartman's wrath even further. As the ultimate form of vengeance, Cartman invites Scott to a chili cook off, with a terrifying secret ingredient.—Miss Kedabory
